original_text: If the old rules could do that, the priests would have stopped offering sacrifices. The people who came to worship God would have become completely clean once, for all time. They would no longer have trouble in their minds about their sins.
korean_text: 그렇지 아니하면 섬기는 자들이 단번에 정결하게 되어 다시 죄를 깨닫는 일이 없으리니 어찌 제사 드리는 일을 그치지 아니하였으리요

sentences.original_text: If the old rules could do that,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 옛 규율들이 그렇게 할 수 있었다면,

sentences.original_text: the priests would have stopped offering sacrifices.
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장들은 제물을 바치는 것을 멈췄을 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: The people who came to worship God
would have become completely clean once,
They would no longer have trouble in their minds
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 더 이상 마음속에 근심이 없을 것입니다.
